Groww stands out as a superb and user-friendly investment application that has genuinely simplified investing for millions in India, particularly for those new to the markets.Its clean and intuitive interface makes the process of investing in Direct Mutual Funds, stocks, IPOs, and F&Os remarkably smooth and completely paperless. Crucially, it offers Zero Commission on direct mutual funds, which allows investors to earn potentially higher returns. Coupled with a transparent and low-cost brokerage

Groww, wake up your so-called user-friendly app is a complete embarrassment. Fix your onboarding NOW, or stop pretending you care about investors

Groww is an Indian investment & trading platform that lets you invest in stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, IPOs, derivatives, digital gold, etc. It started mainly as a mutual fund investment app and then expanded to full-fledged stock trading, ETFs, and more. It provides tools, charts, portfolio views, and return metrics to help investors track performance.

Groww is a scam, it shows wrong invested balance i.e. very low balance so that people sell at a lower price than what they have invested and they suffer loss. You people should be cautious of Groww app scam and it is important to calculate whatever you invest.

I regret choosing this platform. While the user interface looks polished and onboarding was smooth, the app fails spectacularly at the absolute most critical time for any trader: market opening. Every single morning, without fail, as the clock hits 9:15 AM (or within the first five crucial minutes), the servers completely seize up. The app becomes unresponsive, trades won't execute, and worst of all, I can't exit positions. This isn't a minor glitch; it is a fundamental flaw
